thread.title: LIVE: Death squad 'leader' faces Senate panel
thread.title_full: LIVE: Death squad 'leader' faces Senate panel

title: LIVE: Death squad 'leader' faces Senate panel
text:
Headlines ( Leaderboard Top ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: 1 LIVE: Death squad 'leader' faces Senate panel By PhilstarLIVE (philstar.com) | Updated March 6, 2017 - 10:00am Will the retired Davao cop Arthur Lascañas tell all? 
Arthur Lascañas, a cop and self-confessed hitman, is expected to recount his experience as an alleged member of the Davao Death Squad before the Senate public order committee looking into extrajudicial killings. The panel is chaired by Sen. Panfilo Lacson, who was chief of the Philippine National Police. 
Catch the coverage of the proceedings here on Monday, Mar. 6, 2017 scheduled at 10 a.m.
